summary: When the Snow Queen, a lonely and powerful fairy, kidnaps the human boy Kay, his best friend Gerda must overcome many obstacles on her journey to rescue him.
cast: Vladimir Gribkov|Yanina Zheymo|Anna Komolova|Mariya Babanova|Sergey Martinson|Galina Kozhakina|Art Linkletter|Billy Booth|Rickey Busch|Jennie Lynn|Tammy Marihugh|Paul Frees|Sandra Dee|Tommy Kirk|Lillian Buyeff|Louise Arthur|June Foray|Dick Beals|Joyce Terry|Patty McCormack
title: La reina de las nieves
